replies.body:
Hey Smile, 

It looks like the account that gifted you Dragonblade Riven was found to participate in fraudulent activities, and all gifts that the player sent out with the RP obtained through fraud were removed. dArtagnan made a post about this [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/gfX587IW-champsskins-i-was-gifted-are-gone-where-did-they-go).
If you think you're missing content,[ open a ticket with player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
